lore: The yordle mage Lulu is known for conjuring dreamlike illusions and fanciful creatures as she roams Runeterra with her fairy companion Pix. Lulu shapes reality on a whim, warping the fabric of the world, and what she views as the constraints of this mundane, physical realm. While others might consider her magic at best unnatural, and at worst dangerous, she believes everyone could use a touch of enchantment.
title: the Fae Sorceress
blurb: The yordle mage Lulu is known for conjuring dreamlike illusions and fanciful creatures as she roams Runeterra with her fairy companion Pix. Lulu shapes reality on a whim, warping the fabric of the world, and what she views as the constraints of this...
allytips: Glitterlance can be fired at odd angles depending on where your cursor is - Moving your cursor closer to Pix and Lulu will change your area of effect size considerably.
Consider casting Help, Pix! on ranged attackers for the Pix boost and Wild Growth on Tanks or Fighters for the added initiation power.

passive.name: Pix, Faerie Companion
passive.description: Pix is a wild Faerie that accompanies Lulu. Pix will fire a barrage of magical energy at targets that Lulu attacks.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Pix is a wild Faerie that accompanies Lulu. Pix will fire a barrage of magical energy at targets that Lulu attacks.

enemytips: The shots from Lulu's faerie can be intercepted - hide behind your minions to avoid the additional Faerie attacks.
Lulu excels when opponents heavily commit. Don't give her this chance! Use heavy harass tactics instead to force Lulu and her partner out of lane.
name: Lulu

spells.name: Glitterlance
spells.description: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.
spells.tooltip:
Lulu and Pix each fire a piercing bolt dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy hit and {{ f4 }} (+{{ f5 }}) to all additional enemies. Enemies hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}%, decaying over the next {{ e3 }} second(s).

An enemy can only be damaged for up to a total of {{ f6 }} damage per cast.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Lulu and Pix each fire a piercing bolt dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy hit and {{ f4 }} (+{{ f5 }}) to all additional enemies. Enemies hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}%, decaying over the next {{ e3 }} second(s). An enemy can only be damaged for up to a total of {{ f6 }} damage per cast.

spells.name: Whimsy
spells.description: If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.
spells.sanitizedDescription: If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.
spells.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Target ally gains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }})% Movement Speed and {{ e7 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

On Enemy Cast: Polymorphs an enemy champion for {{ e3 }} seconds, disabling their ability to attack or cast spells and reducing their base Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: On Ally Cast: Target ally gains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }})% Movement Speed and {{ e7 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds. On Enemy Cast: Polymorphs an enemy champion for {{ e3 }} seconds, disabling their ability to attack or cast spells and reducing their base Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}.

spells.name: Help, Pix!
spells.description: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.
spells.sanitizedDescription: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.
spells.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Commands Pix to jump to an ally and then follow and aid their attacks instead of Lulu's for {{ e1 }} seconds. If the ally is a champion, Pix shields them from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e1 }} seconds.

On Enemy Cast: Pix deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to target enemy unit. Pix then follows and grants True Sight of them for {{ e6 }} seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: On Ally Cast: Commands Pix to jump to an ally and then follow and aid their attacks instead of Lulu's for {{ e1 }} seconds. If the ally is a champion, Pix shields them from {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e1 }} seconds. On Enemy Cast: Pix deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to target enemy unit. Pix then follows and grants True Sight of them for {{ e6 }} seconds.

spells.name: Wild Growth
spells.description: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.
spells.tooltip: Lulu enlarges her ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air. For {{ e4 }} seconds, her ally gains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus health and slows nearby enemies by {{ e2 }}%.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Lulu enlarges her ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air. For {{ e4 }} seconds, her ally gains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus health and slows nearby enemies by {{ e2 }}%.
